entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3 with risk of frost. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Low plus 3 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 27 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 27 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of thunderstorms in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 27 May 2016
